reviewText: I love this video!  I never got a chance to see S.O.D. when they were originally around, and I doubt I'll ever get to see them any time soon, so this tape is a thrashin' treat.  This is the live taping of that one show so it's pretty much identical to the CD that was released for this tour, but with a few behind the scenes interviews and footage.  I also noticed that they cut all the BS that went down on the CD, which is fine by me because the crowd was violent enough without adding negativity to it.  If you can, pick it up...I don't think it's in print, so good luck!
